title: Singing Basics
content: Children learn how to use their voice to sing simple songs. Singing helps memory and makes learning fun.

title: Musical Instruments
content: Introduction to common instruments like drum, flute, and piano. Pupils learn to identify their sounds.

title: Simple Rhymes
content: Rhymes are short songs that teach rhythm and language. Pupils repeat rhymes daily for fun learning.

title: Movement and Dance
content: Pupils move their bodies to music, learning rhythm and coordination while dancing.

title: Clapping Games
content: Fun clapping songs improve rhythm and teamwork among children.

title: Nigerian Current Affairs
content: Children learn about Nigeria's leaders, flag, and important places.

title: World Current Affairs
content: Introduction to countries, flags, and leaders around the world.

title: Colors and Shapes in Music
content: Children connect colors and shapes with songs and objects in their environment.

title: Storytelling with Rhymes
content: Pupils learn short stories told in rhymes to boost imagination.

title: Festival Songs
content: Children learn songs for special days like Christmas, Eid, and Independence Day.
